channel.title: go on Francisco Jiménez
channel.description: Recent content in go on Francisco Jiménez

item.title: The Go vs Rust in GIS
item.description: As a geospatially-minded professional, I couldn’t help but notice a gap in the ongoing debate between Go and Rust: what about GIS? So, let me share some brief reflections on developing geospatial applications in Go and Rust. Go Go is very easy to pick up, especially for those versed in C or C++. Python users may take a bit longer to grasp concepts like pointers, but Go’s overall simplicity facilitates easy team adoption.
